Text: .avi or bust, dont have an ipod, im a poor bastard. Also dont like vlc, has no dfx support, avi please.

this is a 480p file, they don't come as avi's.

download the hdtv version instead, :)

.AVIs are the past.

You don't need VLC to play .mkv.  I prefer MPC-HC myself, but on Windows 7, you just need to add haali media splitter, and Windows Media Player will work, if you insist on that.

Also if you want the big size of AVI files.

Do a search and add xvid to it. That will get you those big fat AVIs.

Thanks Johnpc666 for the nice small x264 files.

True, these small file sizes rule. I have 2TB's but i still prefer these files (especially mSD) over the larger AVI's.

And I personally use KMPlayer for video.
But you can always add the CCCP pack to media player if you perfer. :)

I would happily download what plays for me in winamp, but none have offered an avi, ill just convert it, no biggie, just used to it being ready for me, guess im spoiled a tad, still, thanks for the up!
